New themes for MDM


Posted By Arpan Biswas • Apr 21, 2015

Mint Display Manager ( MDM ) is a new kind of display manager as it comes with lots of unique features. The most exiciting thing i love about it, is it supports html, css and javascript.

I made two new html themes for MDM with the help of the emulator it provides. You can find this themes on github under MIT license.

Download Fork Star

Mint Display Manager ( MDM ) is a new kind of display manager as it comes with lots of unique features. The most exiciting thing i love about it, is it supports html, css and javascript.

I made two new html themes for MDM with the help of the emulator it provides. You can find this themes on github under MIT license.
